page.title: 05A visit to Bathpool,Talke
page.content: When we visited our Domesday square we saw Target Wood with many deciduous trees.We walked over this log where Craig nearly fell in and saw two screeching kestrels after a squirrel.Before we walked through Ashenough Farm we heard some hens and pigs,saw a sign which read Â£sheep grazing keep dogs out'and we saw the sheep grazing in the field.We walked over this railway bridge near a playing field with swings and an old steam roller.We reached the pavement and copied a road sign of the Talke roundabout then walked to Harecastle Farm,a stuart building which we visited.Later,and sketched the oak roof beams.
